duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide acute care and medical services to patients across different departments and units.
Float across various hospital units, adapting to different patient needs and medical requirements.
Work with a team of healthcare professionals to ensure patient well-being and recovery.
Administer medications, operate medical equipment, and closely monitor patients' condition and progress.
Collaborate with physicians, specialists, and other healthcare staff to deliver comprehensive patient care.
Maintain accurate patient records, document care provided, and communicate effectively with the healthcare team.
